Title: Gran Torino
Overview: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.
Tagline: Ever come across somebody you shouldn't have f#cked with?
Keywords: rape, war veteran, immigration, priest, gang, old man, teenager, gangster, detroit, widower, car, hmong
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, Malpaso Productions, Gerber Pictures, Warner Bros., Double Nickel Entertainment, Matten Productions, WV Films IV
Cast: Clint Eastwood, Christopher Carley, Bee Vang
